title: >>> TIC TOC, Tic Toc
body_text:
August 4, 2007: Two Spots Left
DODGEBALL 100 Final Captains
Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Justin Pierce, John Tronolone; doesn't get a whole hell of a lot better than that. The most star-studded encounter, bar none, with two empty spots remaining! Find out who fills the voids this Saturday night.
August 4, 2007: The Main Event
ALISON BERTSCH v. TOM ADAMS
Just one event shy of the "summer sizzler", arguably the most gifted of the genders take center stage as powerhouse throwers Alison Bertsch and Tom Adams meet one on one.
Bertsch, who debuted at the inaugural
Wet War
DODGEBALL VII, has truly earned her title of
female titan
. One of dodgeball's toughest competitors, her no fear, no quit attitude has earned her the respect and admiration of her peers on and off the court.
And Adams, much like his opponent, has nothing to prove heading into this "battle of the sexes". The award-winning, hard-hitting legend himself has taken down only the biggest and the best and lived to tell about it.
This is undoubtedly a match for the ages and it can only happen at DODGEBALL NINETY-NINE.
...................................
August 4, 2006: A Momumental Day in Dodgeball History
DODGEBALL 50
All of the Applebee's gatherings, the late-night Dunkin' Donuts chats, the adrenaline rush each and every time one set foot on the dodgeball courts culminated into one lifelong picture at the historic
DODGEBALL 50
. And now a year later, for many of dodgeball's elite, it's hard to believe the "local phenomenon" has made it this far.
body_html:
August 4, 2007: Two Spots Left
DODGEBALL 100 Final Captains
Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Justin Pierce, John Tronolone; doesn't get a whole hell of a lot better than that. The most star-studded encounter, bar none, with two empty spots remaining! Find out who fills the voids this Saturday night.

August 4, 2007: The Main Event
ALISON BERTSCH v. TOM ADAMS
Just one event shy of the "summer sizzler", arguably the most gifted of the genders take center stage as powerhouse throwers Alison Bertsch and Tom Adams meet one on one.

Bertsch, who debuted at the inaugural Wet War DODGEBALL VII, has truly earned her title of female titan. One of dodgeball's toughest competitors, her no fear, no quit attitude has earned her the respect and admiration of her peers on and off the court.

And Adams, much like his opponent, has nothing to prove heading into this "battle of the sexes". The award-winning, hard-hitting legend himself has taken down only the biggest and the best and lived to tell about it.

This is undoubtedly a match for the ages and it can only happen at DODGEBALL NINETY-NINE.
...................................

August 4, 2006: A Momumental Day in Dodgeball History
DODGEBALL 50
All of the Applebee's gatherings, the late-night Dunkin' Donuts chats, the adrenaline rush each and every time one set foot on the dodgeball courts culminated into one lifelong picture at the historic DODGEBALL 50. And now a year later, for many of dodgeball's elite, it's hard to believe the "local phenomenon" has made it this far.
